content.rendered: Poorna joined Regent in 2020 as Video Editor. He has been passionate about creating video productions after his completing his A/L studies. He proudly graduated from Cardiff Metropolitan University with a collaboration at ICBT City Campus Sri Lanka. He has also enrolled into a Business Information Systems degree. For his final thesis, he completed research about the Sri Lankan film industry. He has a passion and desire to learn new trends, about new cameras, and new technologies about video production. Poorna possesses over 7 years of work experience in the video production field in Sri Lanka.
